TEXT.TITLE: NEWHALL INVESTMENT PROPERTIES <NIP> 3RD QTR
TEXT.BODY: Shr 1.13 dlrs vs 87 cts Net 5,010,000 vs 3,868,000 Nine mths Shr 4.91 dlrs vs 4.84 dlrs Net 21.8 mln vs 21.5 mln NOTE: Current quarter figures include gain of 4.7 mln dlrs on property sales vs gain of 2.9 mln in prior year's quarter. Current nine month figures include gain of 20.5 mln dlrs on property sales vs gain of 19 mln dlrs. Reuter
